body:
today before playing a match for the unofficial tournament i was locked out of my account and couldn't sign in.
I looked through my book of passwords and emails and it still wouldn't sign me in. i also tried logging in on the minecraft website and nothing. I restarted my launcher(didnt work) I restarted my computer(didnt work) I dont know what to do at this point because i know 100% my email and password but it will not work plz help
body_tagged:
today before playing a match for the unofficial tournament i was locked out of my account and couldn't sign in.
I looked through my book of passwords and emails and it still wouldn't sign me in. i also tried logging in on the minecraft website and nothing. I restarted my launcher(didnt work) I restarted my computer(didnt work) I dont know what to do at this point because i know 100% my email and password but it will not work plz help
title: Minecraft account :(

replies.body: Just change your password. Same thing happened to me and it worked after I changed it.
replies.body_tagged: Just change your password. Same thing happened to me and it worked after I changed it.

replies.body:
If you reset your password successfully and you still can't log in, it's a minecraft glitch. Just wait a few hours to a day and it will be fixed. 
There have been many times people posted help for this and have had the same problem which was what I stated above.
replies.body_tagged:
If you reset your password successfully and you still can't log in, it's a minecraft glitch. Just wait a few hours to a day and it will be fixed. 
There have been many times people posted help for this and have had the same problem which was what I stated above.

replies.body:
Did you buy your account in the official Minecraft website or you bought it in pages like "Minecraft Full Access for 1 dollar"

If you bought your account from the official website, you should have the "Transaction ID" in your email, if you have that code you must send a message to support with that code so you will get your account back.

If you bought your account via the second way so you lost your account.

You can still recover your account without it, send an email to Mojang Suport and follow their instructions.
Good luck.
